section.title: Introduction
section.p: This report covers &os;-related projects between October and December 2013. This is the fourth of four reports planned for 2013.
Thanks to all the reporters for the excellent work! This report contains 1 entry and we hope you enjoy reading it.
The deadline for submissions covering between January and March 2014 is April 7th, 2014.

body.p: CBSD is another &os; jail management solution, aimed at combining various features, such as racct(8), vnet, zfs(8), carp(4), hastd(8), into a single tool. This provides a more comprehensive way for building application servers using pre-installed jails with a typical set of software, and requires a minimal effort to configure.
